reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I needed a new vacuum...and searched and searched
reviews.reviewText: So, my 15+plus year Eureka Complete Clean was no longer working. It had a torn hose and Eureka doesn't make them anymore. I only loved it due to the heavy duty suction and leaving 'great' lines in carpet. I wanted a new canister but was unable to find one with a power roller/brush I bought a Bissell something upright, broke on first use, returned. So, I was once again searching for a vacuum. I find this one for 150.00...it has metal wands, metal bottom, a power roller/brush (not self propelled but...) I decided to try this. It arrived within 2 days, it was easy to put together. I have vacuumed my entire house. I have small home and only needed to unplug once and move to another socket once, so the cord is super long for me. I must say, I am impressed. Now, I can't see how much is sucked up into bag, I will definitely check. I was able to vacuum all area rugs on '1' setting btw. So far, so good. Well worth the money.. I have literally had it less than an hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its a very good vac. had my last one 10 years
reviews.reviewText: i like how compact it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was getting tired of replacing "At home " vaccums.The last traw was when my " At home" vacuum started to spit out all the dust I was vaccuming.I orderded the Sanitair Commercial vaccum via Amazon. It arrived 1 day later. This is an awesome vaccum.It took about 30 minutes to assemble- that's because my toddlers were around preventing me for being focus. It does an excellnt job and I know will last a very long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product, but
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum fits my purpose, but it can with a dent/bend in the handle.My previous one lasted years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This upright vacuum is the best vacuum ever for carpet. The suction is insanely great. I’ve used this vacuum for 15 years or better and I don’t plan on switching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Animals, kids, carpet? Winner.
reviews.reviewText: I love vacuums. I’m a neat freak at heart, but with the kids and animals at the age they’re are, it isn’t gunna happen. As long as my floors are clean though, I feel like I’m at least kind of on top of it.I’ve had 2 Dysons, 2 Sharks, a few Hoover, Bissel, etc. My husband and kids refuse to learn not EVERYTHING should be sucked up with a vacuum, so none of them last very long. It’s mostly cheaper to buy a new vacuum than try to repair one of those.I got this for my downstairs carpeted areas that get destroyed by kid mung, muddy dog hair, hay bits brought in from outside…my Shark Navigator Lift-Away was not cutting it. Vacuumed very slowly with the Shark before I pulled this out, and holy crap the stuff it sucked out of there was mind blowing.I wouldn’t say it’s close to Sanitaires $350 commercial vac, but it does a surprisingly good job for the price. Being able to fix it myself is another huge plus.It’s for vacuuming carpets. It doesn’t work on hard floor as you can’t turn the brush roll off. It doesn’t have attachments, but there’s less things to potentially break and a cheap handheld vac could fill that void-for as well as it does with carpet it’s worth it.It does well with large area rugs, but not smaller doorway sized ones, just sucks them up.It’ll take forever to fill the bag before needing to empty. The edge game isn’t great (again, use a handheld), it’s heavier and harder to push than a canister vac, but that’s because it has better suction-it isn’t “hard” by any means, just different.Love it, would buy again in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worked great...until it didn't!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this vaccuum a year and a half ago and until recently, we absolutely loved it. As a household with multiple dogs, it was perfect for pet hair and everyday life messes. Super easy to empty the bag and clean it out. We noticed the belt/brush roller wasn't turning about 2 weeks ago and subsequently was not sucking anything up on carpet. We immediately checked all areas that could possibly need maintenance. We emptied the bag (even though it did not need it) and we replaced the belt, and yet still the belt/brush rollers wouldn't turn. We're at a loss and frustrated that a vaccuum we spent this much money on doesn't even last 2 years! Super unhappy!!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timeless Design for a Reason
reviews.reviewText: Assembles easily, plenty of power, and surprisingly quiet. I had a couple of dirt devil models and was never satisfied. The last one was horrible, very loud, and was designed to clog on every use. I gave it away and ordered this, which reminds me of the days when things worked as intended. I am not disappointed, this vacuum delivers as advertised and blew me away on first use. If I ever have to replace it I may upgrade to a better Sanitaire, but I will never buy any other type. If I want a hose and attachments, I use a shop vac for those purposes. Combo products typically are not very good at anything they do. This is for rugs and carpets and it's great at that!
I bought more than 17 one for my business. And I bought 7 units this year.
very light weight easy for women to use at work
Really good on a low pile carpet. Easy to use lots of suction

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent vacuum! Tough, good suction, great value!
reviews.reviewText: Used daily in janitorial business - durable with above average suction. Will easily last a long time with house-hold use. Generous cord length. Good quality beater brush.

Bought 2 of these just to vaccum a couple of runner mats in a store and they have been very unreliable.Constantly breaking belts, on/off switch stopped working , clips that hold the cord broke ect. Staff hates them. Commercial vaccum my ass don't waste your money like we did !
